categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi actors

nodes.text: Ben Munro is an art director who worked within the art department of Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi. He has a small cameo in the film, appearing as a Resistance member in the Crait outpost. On-screen for only a few moments, Munro was one of several crew members to appear as an extra in the control room set. Director Rian Johnson later identified him in the film's audio commentary.
